game.name: Candy Pop
game.description:
Are you a candy lover? Can matching games help to kill your time easily? Join Candy Pop game and get ready to enter the huge world full of colorful candies! Your objective in this brand new arcade game is to match 3 more candies and eliminate them from the board. Match as many candies as you can to score a number of points in an unlimited time as there is no limit to complete your level. Try it out when you are waiting for someone to hang out or standing in a queue to clear your bills!

The best part is that more than one beautiful candy is waiting for you to be crushed. Make them crash and create a new high score in this highly addictive and challenging match-three game! Use your mouse on PC or tap the screen on mobile phone to clear the candies from the board! There are multiple levels and different kinds of strange and mysterious landscapes to play through. Use your logical analysis and brain power to connect as many candies as you can to grab some extra points!

Use the points to prepare your own power ups and enjoy an opportunity to progress faster through the level! Be fast and try to make your way across multiple types of sweet ingredients while clearing levels by popping candies! Track your present score and new best score on the top of the screen! You can also look there to know which level you are presently in. Check out more arcade candy games for free on atmegame.com and have fun alone or with your friends without download!

game.webControlKeys: KEEP PRESS L CLICK OF MOUSE ANS SWIPE TO MATCH THE SAME IMAGES IN ROW AND COLOMS, MATCH AT LEAST 3 IMAGES
